snippet: With temperatures expected to reach up to 104 degrees in some areas, authorities are fighting wildfires, keeping an eye on the elderly and advising people to drink fluids as temperatures soar.
abstract: French authorities are fighting wildfires, keeping an eye on isolated elderly populations and advising people to drink fluids as temperatures continue to soar.
lead_paragraph: With temperatures expected to reach up to 104 degrees in some areas, authorities are fighting wildfires, keeping an eye on the elderly and advising people to drink fluids as temperatures soar.
